title: Swadhin Mondal
text:
About Me
Experienced economist holding a PhD with over 15 years in academia, research, and policy analysis.
Expertise includes econometric modeling, forecasting, cost-benefit analysis, and causal inference to deliver robust, evidence-based insights.
Skilled in advising governments, private sector entities, and international development organizations on economic strategies and policy formulation.
Proven track record in applying advanced quantitative methods to real-world challenges, with a commitment to impactful research and data-driven decision-making.
Legally authorized to work in the UK and keen to contribute economic expertise to dynamic teams in London.
